function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of analysis of the impact of external micro-and macro environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Comprehensive analysis of external environment impact, implementation of measures to minimize disease transmission, and adherence to public health guidelines","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, air filtration systems, contactless technology, and remote monitoring tools","People":"Occupants of the built environment, construction workers, and other stakeholders","Owner":"Architects, planners, developers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of COVID-19 situation in green building life cycle process","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission within the building and surrounding areas","Mitigation":"Incorporating COVID-19 specific design and construction measures, prioritizing health and safety in the design process, and implementing infectious disease control strategies","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, UV-C disinfection systems, touchless fixtures, and ventilation optimization systems","People":"Building occupants, construction personnel, and community members","Owner":"Building designers, engineers, construction companies, and local health authorities"}]}
